widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: New Disability Law Center Added: We released our 52nd Center on Disability Law, covering benefits available to people with disabilities and their rights in employment, housing, and other vital areas.
Justia Legal Dictionary: We completed the AI prompts for generating and checking the definitions in the Justia Legal Dictionary.

50-State Surveys Expanded: We wrote civil and criminal statutes of limitations, and dram shop laws surveys, which will be added to our Lawyers & The Legal Process, Criminal Law, and Car Accidents centers, respectively.
Commercial Real Estate Content: We continued to write pages for the Small Business Center on legal concerns for businesses buying, selling, or leasing property.

Justia Mexico Portal: Our team updated and included new pages for the Labor Law Center on the Justia Mexico Portal. We covered relevant information for employees, employers, and lawyers, including laws and jurisprudence regarding employee profit sharing, dismissal, wrongful dismissal, resignation, paid vacation, and more. Magazines and media press articles have cited some of this content.
